title: Anyone have a low grade t205 Young for t206 Young
author: bbcard1

posts.post_title: Anyone have a low grade t205 Young for t206 Young
posts.post_content:
Just checking...I have a Young Glove Shows (currently on ebay, but the notion of a trade struck me) that I would be glad to trade for a comparable value T205 Young or Johnson for my set.  Low grade but attractive. 

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=220688487975&ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT[/url]

I have lots of watchers but no bidders and a trade would work just as well for me...LMK if you have one.  Also need a low grade Joss, but that's probably dreaming....
